divs: sighting detailscall and i tell u it allways happens, sometimes trianglular, disk,orbs super bright lights, shimmering almost looks like liquid disk in day.see em in my spotting scope ; see often .last one very close plane was coming so it ascended(fast) plane? triangle w\three lights & one in center went by fast also silent slight hiss then it came down next i remember came home xcept it was way later (330am)my dog keeps looking up and flinching?? this has happend b fore i know who they r .kh.47
